actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of $12.4 million at July 1976 prices for rehabilitation and resettlement of Enewetak Atoll, Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $12,400,000 at July 1976 prices for the rehabilitation and resettlement of Enewetak Atoll. Subjects any award of compensation to a Micronesian inhabitant on claims for property damage against the United States to specified offsets for previous monies or consideration.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of $12.4 million at July 1976 prices for rehabilitation and resettlement of Enewetak Atoll, Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
